languages.text: Те, кто внимает святым отцам и не берет в рот ни крошки, исцеляются и больше не подвержены приступам. Другие обгладывают собственные пальцы, умирая в муках чудовищного голода.

Those who heed the preachers' words and abstain from eating anything at all are eventually cured of the ravenous fits. Others gnaw their own fingers to the bone, perishing in the throes of the terrible hunger.
languages.original_text: Те, кто внимает святым отцам и не берет в рот ни крошки, исцеляются и больше не подвержены приступам. Другие обгладывают собственные пальцы, умирая в муках чудовищного голода.

traits.locale_text: Those who heed the preachers' words and abstain from eating anything at all are eventually cured of the ravenous fits. Others gnaw their own fingers to the bone, perishing in the throes of the terrible hunger.
When the wait comes to an end, the survivors are greeted by a scene of desolation and destruction.

Those who heed the preachers' words and abstain from eating anything at all are eventually cured of the ravenous fits. Others gnaw their own fingers to the bone, perishing in the throes of the terrible hunger.

languages.text: Ceux qui suivent les recommandations des prédicateurs et s'abstiennent de manger quoi que ce soit finissent par être délivrés de leurs accès de boulimie incontrôlables. Les autres, en revanche, rongent leurs propres doigts jusqu'à l'os et périssent dans les affres d'une faim insoutenable.
languages.original_text: Those who heed the preachers' words and abstain from eating anything at all are eventually cured of the ravenous fits. Others gnaw their own fingers to the bone, perishing in the throes of the terrible hunger.

traits.locale_text: Ceux qui suivent les recommandations des prédicateurs et s'abstiennent de manger quoi que ce soit finissent par être délivrés de leurs accès de boulimie incontrôlables. Les autres, en revanche, rongent leurs propres doigts jusqu'à l'os et périssent dans les affres d'une faim insoutenable.

languages.text: プリーチャーの言葉に耳を傾け、一切の食事を控えた者たちはやがて猛烈な発作が治まった。そうしなかった者たちは、自分の指を骨までかじり、ひどい飢えの苦しみの中で死んでいった。
languages.original_text: Those who heed the preachers' words and abstain from eating anything at all are eventually cured of the ravenous fits. Others gnaw their own fingers to the bone, perishing in the throes of the terrible hunger.

traits.locale_text: プリーチャーの言葉に耳を傾け、一切の食事を控えた者たちはやがて猛烈な発作が治まった。そうしなかった者たちは、自分の指を骨までかじり、ひどい飢えの苦しみの中で死んでいった。

languages.text: 那些听从布道士的指令，不去吃任何东西的人，最终摆脱了可怕的病症，不再为饥饿所苦。与此同时，另一群人以血肉为食，把自己的手指啃了个精光，最终在可怕的饥饿中惨死。
languages.original_text: Those who heed the preachers' words and abstain from eating anything at all are eventually cured of the ravenous fits. Others gnaw their own fingers to the bone, perishing in the throes of the terrible hunger.

traits.locale_text: 那些听从布道士的指令，不去吃任何东西的人，最终摆脱了可怕的病症，不再为饥饿所苦。与此同时，另一群人以血肉为食，把自己的手指啃了个精光，最终在可怕的饥饿中惨死。

languages.text: Quienes escuchan a los predicadores y se abstienen por completo de comer acaban por reponerse de su hambre, mientras que los otros acaban royendo sus propios dedos hasta el hueso y perecen a manos de ella.
languages.original_text: Those who heed the preachers' words and abstain from eating anything at all are eventually cured of the ravenous fits. Others gnaw their own fingers to the bone, perishing in the throes of the terrible hunger.

traits.locale_text: Quienes escuchan a los predicadores y se abstienen por completo de comer acaban por reponerse de su hambre, mientras que los otros acaban royendo sus propios dedos hasta el hueso y perecen a manos de ella.

languages.text: Wer auf die Worte der Prediger hört und dem Essen vollends abschwört, der wird schließlich von den Attacken der Gier geheilt. Die anderen nagen ihre eigenen Finger bis auf die Knochen weg und sterben einen qualvollen Hungertod.
languages.original_text: Those who heed the preachers' words and abstain from eating anything at all are eventually cured of the ravenous fits. Others gnaw their own fingers to the bone, perishing in the throes of the terrible hunger.

languages.text: Vaizlerin sözlerine kulak verip oruç tutanlar, sonunda yırtıcı nöbetlerden kurtuluyor. Diğerleri ise kendi parmaklarını kemiklerine dek kemirerek açlığın pençesinde helak oluyor.
languages.original_text: Those who heed the preachers' words and abstain from eating anything at all are eventually cured of the ravenous fits. Others gnaw their own fingers to the bone, perishing in the throes of the terrible hunger.
